title: Offline Packing Checklist Exporter
description: Build and export reusable packing checklists for offline use.
pageDescription: Create trip-specific checklists and export them for offline access.

sections.title: Checklist Logic
content: Starts with universal essentials like ID, water, and first-aid basics.
Adds category-specific gear based on trip type.
Includes weather-dependent items when rain is expected.

sections.title: Use Cases
content: Weekend camping prep with a shared list.
Motorcycle packing with quick pre-ride checks.
Backpacking checklist reuse across multi-day routes.

sections.title: Tips
content: Keep one 'core' preset and clone per trip.
Print or export before signal drops in remote areas.
Pair with Base Weight Optimizer to remove non-essential load.
